mapper.select: SELECT region_serve.id, region_serve.sale_status, region_serve.serve_item_id, item.name AS serve_item_name, item.serve_type_id, region_serve.region_id, item.reference_price, region_serve.price, region_serve.is_hot, region_serve.create_time, region_serve.update_time, type.name AS serve_type_name FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON region_serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON item.serve_type_id = type.id WHERE region_serve.region_id = #{regionId}

SELECT region_serve.id, region_serve.serve_item_id, region_serve.price, region_serve.city_code, item.name AS serve_item_name, item.img AS serve_item_img, item.detail_img, item.unit FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON region_serve.serve_item_id = item.id WHERE region_serve.is_hot = 1 AND region_serve.sale_status = 2 AND region_serve.region_id = #{regionId}

SELECT type.id, type.name, type.img FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON region_serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON type.id = item.serve_type_id WHERE region_serve.region_id = #{regionId} AND region_serve.sale_status = 2 GROUP BY type.id ORDER BY type.sort_num ASC

SELECT type.id as serve_type_id, type.name as serve_type_name, type.serve_type_icon, region_serve.city_code, region_serve.id as serve_id, item.id as serve_item_id, item.name as serve_item_name, item.serve_item_icon, item.sort_num as serve_item_sort_num FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = region_serve.serve_item_id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON type.id = item.serve_type_id WHERE region_serve.region_id = #{regionId} AND region_serve.sale_status = 2 ORDER BY type.sort_num, item.sort_num

SELECT region_serve.id, region_serve.city_code, region_serve.price, region_serve.is_hot, region_serve.hot_time_stamp, region_serve.sale_status, item.id AS serve_item_id, item.`name` AS serve_item_name, item.img AS serve_item_img, item.detail_img, item.serve_item_icon, item.unit, item.sort_num AS serve_item_sort_num, item.serve_type_id AS serve_type_id, type.`name` AS serve_type_name, type.img AS serve_type_img, type.serve_type_icon, type.sort_num AS serve_type_sort_num FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = region_serve.serve_item_id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON type.id = item.serve_type_id WHERE region_serve.id = #{id}

SELECT region_serve.id, region_serve.city_code, region_serve.price, region_serve.region_id, item.id AS serve_item_id, item.`name` AS serve_item_name, item.img AS serve_item_img, item.detail_img, item.unit FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = region_serve.serve_item_id WHERE region_serve.id = #{id} and region_serve.sale_status = 2

SELECT region_serve.id, region_serve.city_code, region_serve.price, region_serve.region_id, item.id AS serve_item_id, item.`name` AS serve_item_name, item.img AS serve_item_img, item.detail_img, item.unit FROM region_serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = region_serve.serve_item_id WHERE region_serve.region_id = #{regionId} and region_serve.sale_status = 2
